item.description:
SWING vs. SALSA Lessons and Party at Arthur Murray

This is the ultimate dance event! Join TTD as we invite you to an incredible dance party featuring two distinct styles of music - Swing and Salsa!

1) SALSA LESSONS: We begin with Salsa dance lessons as experts teach us how to master the hottest Latin moves.

2) SWING LESSONS: From the Lindy Hop to the Charleston, we continue with timeless Swing moves taught by local Swing Masters.

3) BREAK OUT: Following the lessons, feel free sample two distinct types of dance music. Continue to practice your new moves with our Expert Instructor.


Following the competition, we will play both Swing and Salsa dance music for the rest of the party.

Suggested Attire: Casual.

Directions: 20 Park Plz # 330
Boston, MA 02116

Cost: $24.00
if you purchase by 5 pm Friday, September 19
item.name: SWING vs. SALSA Lessons and Party at Arthur Murray
